events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position on our team. Our HR team will review your submission shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles, specifically the software developer track, given your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to your application. You will be contacted soon for the next steps.
The initial screening call was completed successfully. We appreciated your detailed answers and enthusiasm for software development.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview. We look forward to discussing your skills in depth.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare for questions on algorithms, coding, and system design.
The technical interview was completed. Your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency were impressive and aligned well with our expectations.
An HR interview is scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM UTC. This session will address company culture fit, benefits, and your career goals.
The HR interview went well. You demonstrated a great cultural fit and clear motivation to grow within our software engineering team.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the software engineer position. Detailed compensation and benefits documents have been sent for your review.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your eagerness to join our engineering team.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! We are thrilled to have you onboard as a software engineer and will commence the onboarding process shortly.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome to the team! Please complete all required documentation and attend the orientation sessions.
The hiring process is officially closed. We welcome you as a valued member of our engineering team and look forward to your contributions.
